message: Starting review of Quick Test Phase - gathering phase handover and agent findings
Analyzing test agent output - checking if deliverables were met
Examining SQLite database to verify reviewer_agent_id tracking functionality
Deliverables verified: agent spawned correctly, reviewer_agent_id tracked in SQLite review system

Review completed: CRITICAL BUGS FOUND - (1) Duplicate review spawning race condition in retry worker (2) SQLite schema incomplete, missing final_verdict column prevents verdict submission (3) Multiple concurrent calls to _auto_spawn_phase_reviewers. Both test deliverables technically met (agent spawned, reviewer_agent_id tracked), but system has critical flaws that defeat SQLite migration purpose. Attempted verdict: REJECTED with 4 findings documented.
